item.title: 23. Merge k Sorted Lists
item.description: # O(n * log(k)) time | O(1) space # n - is total number of nodes # k - is number of linked lists def merge_k_lists(self, lists: List[Optional[ListNode]]) -> Optional[ListNode]: if not lists: return None if len(lists) == 1: return lists[0] interval = 1 while interval < len(lists): for i in range(0, len(lists) - interval, interval * 2): lists[i] = self.merge(lists[i], lists[i + interval]) interval *= 2 return lists[0] # 21.
